{"id":1070888645,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1696852859,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1070888645/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"14.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        vector<vector<char>> v(numRows);\n        string result = \"\";\n        for(int i=0; i <s.size();){\n            //Insert first coulumn in all rows ex: PAY\n            for(int j=0; j<numRows; j++){\n                if(i <s.size()){\n                    v[j].push_back(s[i]);\n                    i++;\n                }\n            }\n            //Insert to second column exluding first and last row- ex : P\n            for(int k =numRows-2; k>0 ; k--){\n                if(i <s.size()){\n                    v[k].push_back(s[i]);\n                    i++;\n                }              \n            }\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i< v.size(); i++){\n            string str(v[i].begin(), v[i].end());\n            result.append(str);\n        }\n\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
